column2: Chicken Stir Fry, Time: 20, Portions: 1, Calories: 450, Ingredients: Chicken breast: 150g, Mixed veggies: 200g, Soy sauce: 1 tbsp, Rice: 100g, Procedure: Cook the chicken, add vegetables, pour soy sauce and serve with rice.
